title: Applying alarm ringtones to phone call notification
content:
I love the 'Awaken' alarm notification sound, and I think it should be available for phone calls under the sounds app on my pixel 2 xl. Is it somehow possible to use ringtones like that for incoming phone calls? I don't see how, and I tried activating the sound under incoming phone calls but the option doesn't exist

Screenshot 1 (timestamp 4:44) is the alarm menu showing the ringtone

Screenshot 2 is the phone ringtone menu and the desired ringtone isn't showing
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
